StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_dbaAddSchool]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@mcc_code varchar(5), @state_code varchar(2), @school_name varchar(40), @telephone_number varchar(10), @street varchar(40), @street2 varchar(40), @city varchar(20), @zip_code varchar(9), @deleted char(1), @dod_code varchar(20), @school_type char(2), @user_login varchar(15)
AS
declare @organiza.on_id int set @organiza.on_id=(select organiza.on_id from recrui.ng_organiza.on where mcc_code=@mcc_code and organiza.on_type='RSS')
if @dod_code is NULL begin declare @NewDODCode varchar(20) set @NewDODCode=NULL exec sp_dbaCreateDummyDODCodeFinal @NewDODCode OUTPUT set @dod_code= @NewDODCode end
insert into HIGH_SCHOOL ( ORGANIZATION_ID, STATE_CODE, HIGHSCHOOL_NAME, TELEPHONE_NUMBER, STREET, STREET2, CITY, ZIP_CODE, DELETED, DOD_CODE, SCHOOL_TYPE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE ) values ( @organiza.on_id, @state_code, @school_name, @telephone_number, @street, @street2, @city, @zip_code, @deleted, @dod_code, @school_type, @user_login, getdate() )
if SUBSTRING(@mcc_code, 4, 5)<> 'HQ' begin
--Need to get school code of high school that was just inserted and add school to pro.le table declare @school_code int declare @school_year int
set @school_code=(select school_code from high_school where dod_code=@dod_code) set @school_year=(SELECT DATEPART(yy, getdate()) +1)
INSERT INTO [HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE] ( [SCHOOL_CODE], [SCHOOL_YEAR], [PRIORITY_CODE], [STATUS_CODE], [ACCESS_CODE], [RECRUITER_ID], [PERCENT_TO_COLLEGE], [MALE_SENIORS], [FEMALE_SENIORS], [ASVAB_RESP], [ASVAB_MONTH], [ASVAB_NUM], [SCHEDULED_GRAD_DATE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE] ) VALUES ( @school_code, @school_year, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 'N', NULL, NULL, NULL, 'sa', getdate() ) end
Print 'School was added to High_School and Pro.le tables with the following informa.on' Print '============================================================================================' Print 'School Table' Print '==========' Print 'ORGANIZATION_ID:' + convert(varchar(50),@organiza.on_id) Print 'STATE_CODE:' + convert(varchar(50), @state_code) Print 'HIGHSCHOOL_NAME:' + convert(varchar(50),@school_name) Print 'TELEPHONE_NUMBER:' + convert(varchar(50),@telephone_number) Print 'STREET:' + convert(varchar(50),@street) Print 'STREET2:' + convert(varchar(50),@street2) Print 'CITY:' + convert(varchar(50),@city) Print 'ZIP_CODE:' + convert(varchar(50),@zip_code) Print 'DELETED:' + convert(varchar(50),@deleted) Print 'DOD_CODE:' + convert(varchar(50), @dod_code) Print 'SCHOOL_TYPE:' + convert(varchar(50),@school_type) Print 'USER_LOGIN:' + convert(varchar(50),@user_login) Print ' '
if SUBSTRING(@mcc_code, 4, 5) <> 'HQ' begin
Print 'Pro.le Table' Print '==========' Print 'School Code:' + convert(varchar(10),@school_code) Print 'School Year:' + convert(varchar(4),@school_year) end
Print '===============================================================================================' --Can later use this to retrieve org_id given MCC Already Done --select organiza.on_id from recrui.ng_organiza.on where mcc_code='938AL' and organiza.on_type='RSS'
